notifications.title: Anniversary Day
notifications.text:
We celebrate two years since we opened our office.
Therefore, we have many special offers that might encourage you to come to our office and perhaps find your pet soulmate.

messages.message: Hey, this is a first message.

Hello, i was just curious do you provide medical examinations as a part of your service.
Best regards,
John Doe.
